word: If we are laborers with Christ, we shall work just as Christ worked. Our way and our dispositions are not to be grafted into the work. If we have not the Spirit of Christ, we are none of His. Profession is nothing. "By their fruits ye shall know them."--Manuscript 165, 1898, pp. 1-11. ("Unity a Test of Discipleship," typed December 13, 1898.)
